name: Elizabeth O. MISCOVICH v. Gerald Allan MISCOVICH, Appellant

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
SAYLOR, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ., would reverse the Order of the Superior Court.
parties: Elizabeth O. MISCOVICH v. Gerald Allan MISCOVICH, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
The Court being equally divided, the Order of the Superior Court is affirmed.
SAYLOR, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ., would reverse the Order of the Superior Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Neil Hurowitz, Philadelphia, for Gerald Allan Miscovich.
Lisa Waldman, Reading, Elizabeth O. Miscovich.
casebody.head_matter:
720 A.2d 764
Elizabeth O. MISCOVICH v. Gerald Allan MISCOVICH, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Nov. 16, 1998.
Decided Dec. 14, 1998.
Neil Hurowitz, Philadelphia, for Gerald Allan Miscovich.
Lisa Waldman, Reading, Elizabeth O. Miscovich.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
